NewsArticles.Headline: 'Do Yourself A Favor and Get A Polestar': Tesla Owner Says He Was Trapped in a Tesla Model Y
NewsArticles.Brief: The Tesla owner noted that the company's customer service was sympathetic and offered to buy him a hotel for the night.

NewsArticles.Headline: Tesla will face stock buyback pressure from activist investors next year after shares get cut in half in 2022, Wedbush says
NewsArticles.Brief: Tesla shares were down 6% on Monday, erasing another $30 billion in market cap to extend this year's dismal performance for the stock.

NewsArticles.Headline: NASA chief asks SpaceX president if Elon Musk is too distracted with Twitter
NewsArticles.Brief: Tesla investors have also expressed concern that the billionaire had "abandoned" the electric-car maker in favor of the social media company.
